author: awiner
msg: SHINDIG-1001: Pipelined data not loaded for proxied renders for "default" view

- Refactored HtmlRenderer, extracting proxied rendering into a ProxyRenderer class (in preperation for some more work on pipelined data in proxy renderers).  HtmlRenderer is now once again a simple class.
- Change Preloader and PreloaderService APIs to take Gadget instead of GadgetSpec and GadgetContext.
